column5: Looking at lake Roderick pine island for next year. Anyone have any experience/insight on this outfitter, lodge or lake? Numbers, size etc......thanks in advance

Hoppy, Peter runs a good operation. We started out at Roderick in the late 90's and have moved on to his northern outposts of Bearberry and Hornby every year since in late August to early Sept. In addition to pike and walleye, Roderick also has lake trout. Dave

Hi Hoppy63, I agree with Dave, Peter runs a good operation. We have flown with Chimo with no problems. We have not fished Roderick but have heard very good things. Peter has told us it is one of his personal favorites. Have a great trip.Thank you,Larry Mac
Thanks for replies. Looks like nice place. Was hoping to get some input on size/numbers. Looking at going toward end of June. Baits and areas to fish also, if anyone has experience here. Thanks again
Well, sound like it is set.....going to Roderick lake, pine island lodge June 20-27. Will be a long 7-8 month wait! Any maps, info.....baits ........areas......etc...appreciated
Hi Hoppy63, that is very exciting. I believe you will really enjoy Chimo and Roderick. Peter has very good accommodations, equipment and lakes. EnjoyThank youLarry Mac
Just a friendly "BUMP" in case anyone has any experience/ info on this lake......
Just another friendly "BUMP"....surely there are more people with experience with this area/outfitter.....
